thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Petit Louvre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice convenient hotel
thread.title_full: Nice convenient hotel - Review of Hotel Eiffel Petit Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: keh75
title: Nice convenient hotel
text: Top spec room but very small. Loved everything about the hotel including the cost, the location, a few yards from the metro which was a great plus on a 3 day visit. Within walking distance of the Eiffel Tower. The breakfast was rather expensive€15 each and not that amazing. Would definitely recommend it. You can also get from the airport straight to it for €10 on the RER B.
